Header: Kyrgios and Anderson both win in Japan Open
Content: Australia’s Nick Kyrgios beat Yoshihito Nishioka 7-5 7-6(3) in Tokyo to reach the Japan Open Round of 16.Kyrgios was made to work hard by the 23-year-old Japanese player but the world number 27 was always in control of the match. He’ll next play Frenchman Richard Gasquet on Thursday.Elsewhere, South Africa’s Kevin Anderson beat Australian Matthew Ebden 4-6 7-6(1) 6-2. The Wimbledon finalist will next face Frances Tiafoe of the United States on Thursday.
